data.description: Integer entry widget using spin button.
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Modifing integer values in Gtk2::TreeView is very popular and
    people often want to have SpinButton for this task. This module
    provides SpinButton for integer values in Gtk2::CellRender.
    Additionaly already existing module - Gtk2::Ex::DateSpinner - is
    realizing the same task for typing in a date in ISO format.
